mapper.insert: insert into FREE_LIST(free_list_date, free_list_writer, free_list_type, free_list_title, free_list_content) values(#{free_list_date}, #{free_list_writer}, #{free_list_type}, #{free_list_title}, #{free_list_content})
mapper.update: update FREE_LIST set free_list_views = free_list_views + 1 where free_list_num = #{free_list_num}
